product_name: Native Eyewear Nova Polarized Sunglasses - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Native Eyewear Nova Polarized Sunglasses keep your eyes protected whether you're on the mountain, in town or at the water's edge. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Iron frames come with gray polarized lenses; Maple Tort frames come with brown polarized lenses; both lenses are suitable for sunny days. Lenses are built to withstand a high-velocity impact. Rhyno-Tuff(R) thermoplastic frames endure extreme highs and lows in temperature, with wire-core temples for easy adjustability and a secure fit. Venting along tops and sides of frames helps prevent fogging during vigorous activity. Design ensures the temple ends hug behind the ears to keep sunglasses securely in place. Cam-action spring hinges quickly lock temples in position. Native Eyewear Nova Polarized Sunglasses include a hard protective case and a soft pouch that doubles as a cleaning cloth. Frames best fit medium to large profiles.
short_description: The Native Eyewear Nova Polarized Sunglasses keep your eyes protected whether you're on the mountain, in town or at the water's edge.
